type.name: T:Elysium.Parameters.Slider
type.summary: Represents a class, which manages the settings of the style of the control .

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Slider.TrackSize
property.summary: Gets or sets the width of the track in the control .
property.value: Lenght of the track in trackbar. The default value is 48px.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Slider.GetTrackSize(System.Windows.Controls.Slider)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: Length of the track of a trackbar.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Slider.SetTrackSize(System.Windows.Controls.Slider,System.Double)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
Length of the track of a trackbar.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.Slider.ThumbThickness
property.summary: Gets or sets the height of the track in the control .
property.value: Height of the track in a trackbar. The default value is 6px.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Slider.GetThumbThickness(System.Windows.Controls.Slider)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: Heigth of the track of a trackbar.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.Slider.SetThumbThickness(System.Windows.Controls.Slider,System.Double)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
Height of the track of a trackbar.
method.exception: The parameter has a value null.
